scripts.build: npm run build:babel & npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: npm run clean && postcss --u postcss-import postcss-cssnext cssnano --dir public/css/ src/styles/*.css
scripts.start: npm run watch:babel & npm run watch:css
scripts.watch:css: npm run clean && postcss --u postcss-import postcss-cssnext cssnano --dir public/css/ src/styles/*.css -w
scripts.release: git commit package.json -m "Version $npm_package_version" && npm run tag && git push && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
